member.name: F:Google.Apis.Freebase.v1sandbox.FreebaseService.Mode.Fill
member.summary: Fill rectangle completely with image, relax constraint on one dimension if necessary.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Freebase.v1sandbox.FreebaseService.Mode.Fillcrop
member.summary: Fill rectangle with image, crop image to maintain rectangle dimensions.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Freebase.v1sandbox.FreebaseService.Mode.Fillcropmid
member.summary: Fill rectangle with image, center horizontally, crop left and right.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Freebase.v1sandbox.FreebaseService.Mode.Fit
member.summary: Fit image inside rectangle, leave empty space in one dimension if necessary.

member.summary: How MQL responds to uniqueness failures.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Freebase.v1sandbox.FreebaseService.Uniqueness_failure.Hard
member.summary: Be strict - throw an error.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Freebase.v1sandbox.FreebaseService.Uniqueness_failure.Soft
